column1: Global and regional child deaths by cause

Prepared by the Data and Analytics Section; Division of Data, Research and Policy, UNICEF
Column C: Column Q: 1.Deaths of children under 5 years of age due to. (Percentage deaths by specific cause among all under-five deaths)
Column R: Column AH: 2.Deaths of children under 5 years of age by period due to. (Percentage deaths by specific cause and period (neonatal and 1-59 months) among all under-five deaths)
Column AI: Column AQ: 2.Deaths of children aged 1-59 months due to. (Percentage deaths by specific cause among all deaths aged 1-59 months)
Column AR: Column AZ: 1.Deaths of newborns (first month of life) due to. (Percentage deaths by specific cause among all newborn deaths)
